name: GitHub Actions: Dependency Review
description: Use GitHub dependency-review-action to block vulnerable changes.

files.template:
name: Dependency Review

on: [pull_request]

jobs:
  review:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
      pull-requests: write
    steps:
      - uses: actions/dependency-review-action@v4
        with:
          fail-on-severity: high
